advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
THE NUMBER ONE POKER BRAND, raises the stakes as the best FREE poker experience on iPhone & iPad, hands-down. Enjoy WSOP’s authentic features! Use your winnings to buy into high-stakes tables, and compete with the best poker players. Stack your chips and prove to everyone that you’re a true poker shark!

AUTHENTIC FEATURES 
*MULTI-LEVEL TOURNAMENTS – Atlantic City, Paris, Sydney and Tokyo resorts are waiting to host you! Take a seat and play like a PRO! 
*WSOP RINGS – Win tournaments to earn WSOP Rings and improve your spot on the leaderboard! What’s more fun than being at the top?
*OFFICIAL VEGAS EXPERIENCE – Try your hand at Texas Hold’Em, Omaha, Tournaments, and more for FREE.
*GAIN A COMPETITIVE EDGE – Bet big and become a poker star and improve your game with the most extensive stats tracking in any poker game! 

*MORE FREE CHIPS, MORE OFTEN – Collect FREE chips every four hours! 
*SLOTS MINI GAME – Spin and win chips in between hands with the slot machine.
*PLAY WITH BUDDIES – Invite your friends and make it a poker night anytime, anywhere on mobile devices, tablets and Facebook. 
*CONTINUOUS PLAY – Start playing on your mobile phone or tablet and continue on Facebook with the same bankroll. 
*GUEST MODE – Rock the tables and play anonymously. 
*FACEBOOK CONNECT BONUS – Stack your bankroll with $15,000 additional chips when you connect your account to Facebook! 

GIVE US FEEDBACK Connect with us on Facebook (http://bit.ly/WSOP_Fanpage) and on Twitter (http://bit.ly/TwitterWSOP). We’d love your feedback!
trackCensoredName: World Series of Poker – WSOP Texas Holdem
trackName: World Series of Poker – WSOP Texas Holdem
releaseNotes:
• iPHONE 6 & 6+ SUPPORT – WSOP is now optimized for the brand-new iPhones! 
• IMPROVED TABLE RECONNECTION– Got interrupted? Don’t worry, we’ll put you back in the exact same seat at the exact same table!
• MORE BUG FIXES – We’ve folded more bugs to keep your poker experience sharper than ever!
